      • isValueInRange

        public static boolean isValueInRange(java.lang.Float value,
                     java.lang.Float minimumValue,
                     java.lang.Float maximumValue)
        Validates the input so as to fit within the prescribed range. For Eg. confidence should lie between 0 to 100%
        Parameters:
        value - Float entered by the user.
        minimumValue - Float prescribed starting value for variable.
        maximumValue - Float prescribed ending value for variable.
        Returns:
        TRUE if is in Range and FALSE if not.

        Parameters:
